metadata.description: What happens when your guardian angel falls in love with you? After a traffic accident, Kyle Taylor is on the verge of death. His guardian angel Sarah makes a deal with the Angel of Death to save his life. Will it be something they'll both regret? And what's the Lord of Darkness have to do with it? An all-new shoujo series by the master of American manga, Ben Dunn!
metadata.name: Heaven Sent
